mapper.select: select cp.t_product_id AS id, cp.t_product_title AS title, cp.t_product_saleable AS saleAble, cp.t_product_create_time AS createTime, cp.t_product_update_time AS updateTime from codeworld_product AS cp order by cp.t_product_create_time DESC
select count(t_product_id) from codeworld_product where t_product_category_id = #{categoryId}
select cp.t_product_id AS id, cp.t_product_saleable AS saleAble from codeworld_product AS cp where cp.t_product_id = #{id}

select cp.t_product_id AS id, cp.t_product_title AS title, cp.t_product_category_id AS categoryId, cp.t_product_sub_title AS subTitle, cp.t_product_saleable AS saleAble, cp.t_product_create_time AS createTime, cp.t_product_update_time AS updateTime, cp.t_product_merchant_id AS merchantId, cp.t_product_approve_status AS approveStatus, cp.t_product_approve_remark AS approveRemark, cm.t_merchant_nick_name AS merchantName, cc.t_category_name AS categoryName, cpd.t_product_view AS view, cp.t_store_id AS storeId from codeworld_product AS cp left join codeworld_category AS cc on cp.t_product_category_id = cc.t_category_id left join codeworld_product_detail AS cpd on cp.t_product_id = cpd.t_product_id left join codeworld_merchant AS cm on cp.t_product_merchant_id = cm.t_merchant_id where cp.t_product_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into codeworld_product (t_product_id, t_product_title, t_product_category_id, t_product_saleable, t_product_merchant_id, t_product_create_time, t_product_update_time, t_product_approve_status ) values ( #{id}, #{title}, #{categoryId}, #{saleAble}, #{merchantId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{approveStatus} );
